variables.python:
# Integer variable
count = 10
count += 1
print(count)

# Float variable
price = 420.99
price = price - 0.30
print(price)

# String variable
message = "What the sigma"
message += " fr fr"
print(message)

# Boolean variable
is_leet = True
is_leet = not is_leet
print(is_leet)
variables.javascript:
// Integer variable
let count = 10
count += 1
console.log(count)

// Float variable
let price = 420.99
price = price - 0.30
console.log(price)

// String variable
let message = "What the sigma"
message += " fr fr"
console.log(message)

// Boolean variable
let is_leet = true
is_leet = !is_leet
console.log(is_leet)

if-statements.javascript:
// Integer variable
let count = 10
count += 1
console.log(count)

// Float variable
let price = 420.99
price = price - 0.30
console.log(price)

// String variable
let message = "What the sigma"
message += " fr fr"
console.log(message)

// Boolean variable
let is_leet = true
is_leet = !is_leet
console.log(is_leet)
